name: Netdeck Crowler
author: Ivmatterhorn
notes: As the name implies, I netdecked it from somewhere. Can't remember where. I think I added in the Chalices later, but it's not like they're as useful post-CA. The 5 streak was laughably easy, Game 1 was a Cerberus Bamboo OTK that bricked, Games 2 & 3 were AG mirrors, Game 4 was a Ra player who also bricked, and Game 5 was a literal suicide deck (3SD Simorgh)
